ShipLogDictionary.I should investigate Brittle Hollow for: I should investigate Brittle Hollow for any strange signals.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a warp receiver on the surface o: I found a warp receiver on the surface of Brittle Hollow.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a warp receiver under Brittle Ho: I found a warp receiver under Brittle Hollow's surface, near the Black Hole Forge.
ShipLogDictionary.I should investigate Ember Twin for any: I should investigate Ember Twin for any strange signals.
ShipLogDictionary.I detected intense gravitational and ant: I detected intense gravitational and anti-gravitational readings in the High Energy Lab.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a warp receiver on the surface o: I found a warp receiver on the surface of Ember Twin.
ShipLogDictionary.I should investigate Giant's Deep for an: I should investigate Giant's Deep for any strange signals.
ShipLogDictionary.I found an actively transmitting Nomai s: I found an actively transmitting Nomai statue in the core of Giant's Deep!
ShipLogDictionary.I found another active Nomai statue on a: I found another active Nomai statue on an island on Giant's Deep. I wonder if Gabbro knows anything about this.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a warp receiver on an island on: I found a warp receiver on an island on Giant's Deep
ShipLogDictionary.I should investigate the Ring World for: I should investigate the Ring World for any strange signals.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a signal coming from a building: There is a signal coming from a building in the River Lowlands.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a signal coming from the tower i: I found a signal coming from the tower in the Cinder Isles.
ShipLogDictionary.A building in the Hidden Gorge has a str: A building in the Hidden Gorge has a strange signal coming from it.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a signal coming from a submerged: I found a signal coming from a submerged structure. It sounds sad.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a warp receiver on the Sun Stati: I found a warp receiver on the Sun Station. Getting here without that would be a real achievement.
ShipLogDictionary.I should investigate Timber Hearth for a: I should investigate Timber Hearth for any strange signal frequencies.
ShipLogDictionary.The Nomai statue that looked at me in th: The Nomai statue that looked at me in the museum is transmitting some sort of signal on a frequency I haven't seen before.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a warp receiver on the surface o: I found a warp receiver on the surface of Timber Hearth
ShipLogDictionary.I found a warp receiver in the center of: I found a warp receiver in the center of Ash Twin.
ShipLogDictionary.My signalscope is detecting intense Hawk: My signalscope is detecting intense Hawking Radiation coming from the center of Brittle Hollow. I wonder what I'll find at the other end.
ShipLogDictionary.My signalscope is reading massive anti-g: My signalscope is reading massive anti-graviton fluctuations from the white hole. "Massive" is the wrong word. Anti-massive?
